headline: Conductive Silicone Rubber Market is Projected with A Value of USD 14.45 Billion by 2032, Driven by Growing Demand in Automotive & Electronics Industries | Research by SNS Insider
summary: The rise in demand for Conductive Silicone Rubber-based electronics and automotive parts continues to accelerate due to advancements in material science and increasing use in EMI shielding and thermal management systems.Austin, Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Conductive Silicone Rubber Market Size was valued at USD 7.30 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 14.45 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 7.88% over the forecast period of 2025-2032.
